promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special bear psychic-type pokemon wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystursa, a a gigantic special bear psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Shadowy Knot, Zzzap. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "psychic" or "Crystursa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, bear-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Dwelling in regal fortresses, this colossal mystic bruin manipulates Shadowy Knots to bind foes and emits Zzzap to connect minds in sleep realms.
